DOC.brief_summary: This study tracks the clinical outcomes associated with the OK knee Total Knee Arthroplasty (TKA) system.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Outcomes With Apex (OK) Knee System
DOC.detailed_description: This study tracks the clinical outcomes associated with the OK knee TKA system, including Knee Society Scores, range of motion and stability, overall radiographic and clinical success, and adverse events.
DOC.criteria: see protocol Adults with DJD of the knee undergoing primary total knee arthroplasty aged 2080 years old BMI less than 40
